page.title: 10Farming at Ballantrae.
page.content: Of 12 farmsteads,6 are occupied and worked by owners,5 after amalgation, leave 2 occupied by workers and 3 sold 1 occupied by a tenant.6 farms are completely contained in this block.11 produce beef and cereals.Hereford Cross,Simmental,Charolais,Limousin and Romangola breeds are fed barley,silage <2 cuts>hay and bought in concentrates 9 rear and/or fatten lambs off Cross Bred/Blackface ewes,for sale in local marts.2 have lambing sheds,3 grow potatoes.1 Friesian herd produces milk restricted by quota,for Scottish MMB, bullocks for fattening,replacements. Intensive mechanisation,sometimes hired,requires little labour,but large capital investment.Surplus cottages are sold,let or converted to holiday homes.Few workers have tied houses.The land varies -light sandy,fertile river banks and rocky hillsides.
